Application.featuresString: PROVISIONING, AUTHENTICATE, SEARCH, UNLOCK, ENABLE, PASSWORD, CURRENT_PASSWORD, DIRECT_PERMISSIONS, SYNC_PROVISIONING
Application.name: RSA Template

AttributeDefinition.name: userID
AttributeDefinition.Description: name by which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: firstName
AttributeDefinition.Description: first name of the entity

AttributeDefinition.name: middleName
AttributeDefinition.Description: middle name of the entity

AttributeDefinition.name: lastName
AttributeDefinition.Description: last name for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: notes
AttributeDefinition.Description: notes or description for the entity

AttributeDefinition.name: email
AttributeDefinition.Description: Email of the entity

AttributeDefinition.name: guid
AttributeDefinition.Description: Guid of the entity

AttributeDefinition.name: certificateDN
AttributeDefinition.Description: certificate DN of the entity

AttributeDefinition.name: securityDomain
AttributeDefinition.Description: Security Domain Name to which entity belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: identitySource
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identity Source Name to which entity belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: lastModifiedBy
AttributeDefinition.Description: Admin or user which modified the entity last time

AttributeDefinition.name: lastModifiedOn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last time when the entity was modified

AttributeDefinition.name: accountStartDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time when the entity was created

AttributeDefinition.name: accountExpireDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time when the entity will get expired

AttributeDefinition.name: lastLogin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last time when the entity was logged in

AttributeDefinition.name: forceChangePassword
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether or not user need to change the password during next logon

AttributeDefinition.name: roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: roles

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Group Membership

AttributeDefinition.name: groupName
AttributeDefinition.Description: name by which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: notes
AttributeDefinition.Description: notes or description for the entity

AttributeDefinition.name: guid
AttributeDefinition.Description: Guid of the entity

AttributeDefinition.name: identitySource
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identity Source to which entity belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: securityDomain
AttributeDefinition.Description: Security Domain to which entity belongs
